name: Rok'Nar
description: Rok'Nar is a 3rd person Asset showcase that conveys high-quality, game-ready 3D models, with the main focus being on that of Rok'Nar, the character 3D model, all made by one person! Simply put, this asset showcase shows a beautiful outdoors environment featuring lush forests in a semi-realistic fantasy world, meant to evoke feelings of awe and a desire for exploration.
